clarion.title: Solo exhibition - June-August 2024
clarion.desc: This summer you will be greeted by my art when you enter the lobby of one of the loveliest and most genuine hotels in Stockholm. Come meet me, enjoy light snacks and drinks and experience an inspiring evening of art and creativity on June 14th. See you there!

juste.title: Solo exhibition - May 2025
juste.desc: A warm event where we meet to celebrate joy, freedom and lustfullness. Welcome as you are, mingle and have fun!

about.title: About the artist
about.intro1: The inner driving force emerges from feelings and impressions with emphasis on pain and injustice, freedom and hope. Kajsa has an attraction to the primordial power of humanity, nature and the great feminine strength, the one that is not always visible but is undoubtly there. The crucial aspects our society so often rushes past and thus misses out on.
about.quote: 'Her works are often initially created freely and intuitively, a bit like a dance'
about.intro2: After that, thoughts and a more structured workprocess takes place to produce a unique composition. Finally, an often lengthy process begins with completing the work and giving it its expression and feeling. It may take time, a silent protest against the machinery of society and its all too fast pace.

fact.origin: Born and raised on Gotland 1982, now living and working in Stockholm.
fact.drive: Influenced by her mother Lisa, who followed her passion and her dreams, despite the narrow social norms of the time.
fact.education: Autodidact until 2023 when she, as a 41 year old, attended a one year art program at Ågesta folkhögskola. Batchelor degree in Graphic Arts.
fact.current: Works alongside art, or vice versa, with web development and graphic design.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Reach out to for any questions, orders, requests or potential collaborations. The simplest way is to send me an email
contact.intro2: or you can use the form on this page.
contact.orderDesc1: To place an order, fill the form, or send an email to
contact.orderDesc2: Write in the message how you prefer to get the painting delivered, some artworks can be shipped while some are wuite heavy. I sometimes offer to meet up in the Stockholms are or pick up at my art studio, whatever suits the needs best.
contact.orderDesc3: The studio is located about 40 minutes south of Stockholm city center.

form.name: Name
form.successMsg: Yey! I'll get back to your shortly :)

slug.title: Original artwork:
slug.pickup: Shipping or pick up in Stockholm area
slug.order1: To make an order, fill in the form or send an email to
slug.order2: Remember to write how you prefer to get your painting delivered. Many of the artworks can be shipped while I'm also happy to meet up in the Stockholm area. And you are of course welcome to pick up at my studio, whatever is best for you.
slug.order3: The studio is located in Grödinge, around 40 minutes south of Stockholm city center.
